title: Who is the greatest?
content: With LeBron James turning in a magnificent postseason performance, it’s time to ask whether he’s the greatest player in NBA history. Or is it Michael Jordan? Or Wilt Chamberlain?    Share your thoughts — or make a Top 5 or Top 10 list — in the space below.       Tweet
contentWithMarkup:
With LeBron James turning in a magnificent postseason performance, it’s time to ask whether he’s the greatest player in NBA history. Or is it Michael Jordan? Or Wilt Chamberlain?

Share your thoughts — or make a Top 5 or Top 10 list — in the space below.
